entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shamattawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:55 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 34. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 38. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
